TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 5th Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Our greatly sinful life and unrepentant disposition do thou forestall through thy compassion, O Lord; beside Thee we know none other, O thou that has dominion over life and death: save us, as Thou art the lover of mankind.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 7th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: I will love thee, O Lord, my strength;
in the Lord is my foundation.
SEXTE.STICHOS: My God is my helper, and I hope in Him!

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: O Lord my helper and my redeemer.
upon uprightness hath His countenance looked.
SEXTE.STICHOS: The heavens declare the glory of God, and the firmament proclaimeth the work of Thy hands.
